title: No encoding (or inssufficient encoding) info set
body: UTF-8 info missing, build can be platform-dependent. Remember that there are 2 cases to handle, most basic being `project.build.sourceEncoding`. This [gist](https://gist.github.com/LIttleAncientForestKami/c9b185c123fc97f6022861f645766aa5) may help.
